monsters.name: Tomb Mote
monsters.languages: Understands Common and Abyssal but does not speak

abilities_top.name: Quick Reflexes
abilities_top.desc: `pf2:r` **Trigger** A creature moves within 10 feet of the Tomb Mote. **Effect** The Tomb Mote Strides up to half its Speed without triggering reactions.

abilities_bot.name: Disease (Corpse Bloat)
abilities_bot.desc: ⬻ (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>disease<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>necromancy<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>fortitude<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> DC 17); A creature struck by the Tomb Mote's bite must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude save or contract Corpse Bloat. Stage 1: The creature is __sickened 1__ for 1 day. Stage 2: The creature is __sickened 2__ for 1 additional day. Stage 3: The creature becomes __sickened 2__ and __slowed 1__. This disease has an incubation period of 1d3 days.

health.name: HP
health.desc: 22; __Immunities__: death effects, disease, paralysis, poison, sleep, nonlethal damage

skills.name: Skills
skills.desc: Acrobatics: +5, Deception: +7, Diplomacy: +5, Occultism: +8; Society: +5, Stealth: +8

abilities_mid.name: Go for the Eyes
abilities_mid.desc: `pf2:r` (incapacitation) **Trigger** The tengu critically hits with a beak Strike. **Effect** The tengu attempts to peck out its victim's eyes. The target must attempt a DC 17 Fortitude save.

attacks.name: Occult Spontaneous Spells
attacks.desc:
DC 17, attack +9; __2nd __  _<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Blur<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>_, _<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>3-Rules/Character Building/Spells/Invisibility|Invisibility<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, _<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Mirror Image<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>_; __1st __  _<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Force Barrage<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>_, _<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Grim Tendrils<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>_, _<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Kinetic Ram<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>_, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Mystic Armor<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>
__Cantrips__  __(2nd)__ _<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Ghost Sound<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>_, _<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Needle Darts<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>_, _<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Read the Air<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>_

attacks.name: Sneak Attack
attacks.desc: The tengu deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Conditions/Off-Guard|Off-Guard<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> creatures.

attacks.name: Surprise Attacker
attacks.desc: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Conditions/Off-Guard|Off-Guard<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> to the tengu.

health.name: HP
health.desc: 145; __Hardy Defenses__: SR 19 (reaction: see Blessing of Vecna); DR 5 (magic)

abilities_mid.name: Blessing of Vecna
abilities_mid.desc: `pf2:r` (Divine, Healing, Magical) **Trigger:** A spell targeting the Ebon Aspect fails to affect it due to it's immunities or resistances. **Effect:** Once per round the Ebon Aspect regains HP equal to twice the amount of the resisted damage.

attacks.name: Melee..
attacks.desc:
`pf2:1` Claw (Mangled) +17 (agile, magical)
__Damage__ 1d4+5 bludgeoning
__Effect__ On a critical hit, the target is Clumsy 1 for 1 round as the malformed limb smashes their defenses

attacks.name: Bloodthirst of Erythnul
attacks.desc:
`pf2:0` (Divine, Emotion, Fortune) **Trigger:** The Ebon Aspect scores a critical hit or is reduced to half its HP or less. **Frequency:** Once per day **Effect:** For 1 round, the Ebon Aspect gains:

- Resistance 10 to all damage (bypassed by +2 or higher potency weapons)

- Fast Healing 10

- +2 status bonus to attack and damage rolls

- Melee Strikes gain the <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Forceful<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> trait

attacks.name: Standard of Hextor
attacks.desc: `pf2:2` (Divine, Force, Visual) **Frequency:** Once per day **Effect:** Casts a heightened version of <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Spiritual Weapon<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (4th level) The weapon appears as a flail adjacent to a target within 60 ft.  It makes a Strike at +13 to hit, 2d8+3 force damage.  The weapon lasts 1 minute and further Strikes require 1 action per attack.

abilities_top.name: Equipment
abilities_top.desc: full plate, steel shield, +1 flail, crossbow, 10 bolts, dagger

abilities_bot.name: Divine Font (Harm)
abilities_bot.desc: Theldrick can cast <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Harm<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (3/day) using his own spell slots

spellcasting.name: Divine Spontaneous Casting
spellcasting.desc:
The cleric casts one of the following spells using Wisdom as their spellcasting ability (spell attack +10, spell DC 20):

__Cantrips (3 slots)__: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Divine Lance<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>3-Rules/Character Building/Spells/Light|Light<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Guidance<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Vitality Lash<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>
__1st Level (3 slots)__: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>3-Rules/Character Building/Spells/Bane|Bane<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Bless<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Echoing Weapon<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>
__2nd Level (3 slots)__: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Blazing Armory<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Boneshaker<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Dancing Shield<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>
__3rd Level (2 slots)__: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Rouse Skeletons<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Vampiric Feast<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>

abilities_mid.name: Kyuss Spawnling Venom
abilities_mid.desc: `pf2:1` (__poison__, __injury__) DC 10 Fortitude save __Stage 1 (1 round)__: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Drained 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Sickened 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>  __Stage 2 (1 round)__: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Drained 2<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Sickened 2<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>  __Stage 3__: Unconscious for 1 minute if reduced to 0 HP from Drained

abilities_mid.name: Create Spawn
abilities_mid.desc: `pf2:2` **Requirements**: A fresh humanoid corpse is adjacent. **Effect**: The Kyuss spawnling infests the body with worms. After 1d6+4 rounds, the corpse rises as a <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Spawn of Kyuss<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> (uncontrolled, GM discretion).

abilities_mid.name: Vulnerability to <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Cleanse Affliction<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>
abilities_mid.desc: If the Kyuss spawnling is affected by <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Cleanse Affliction<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> or similar effects, it is instantly destroyed, even though it's undead.

attacks.name: Melee
attacks.desc: `pf2:1` Bite +6 (agile, finesse, magical) __Damage__ 1d4–3 piercing plus Kyuss Spawnling Venom

health.name: HP
health.desc: 110, fast healing 8; __immunities__ <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>death|Death Effects<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Disease<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Paralyzed<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Poison<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Sleep<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> __weaknesses__ Curative Transformation: <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Cleanse Affliction<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> transforms the spawn into a mindless <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>3-Rules/Bestiaries/Monster Core/Zombie Brute|Zombie Brute<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>

attacks.name: ___Ranged___ ⬻ worm toss
attacks.desc: (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Agile<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>range-increment|Range Increment 10ft<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>) +10; Worm attaches on hit (see Create Spawn)

abilities_mid.name: Fear Aura
abilities_mid.desc: (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Aura<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Emotion<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Fear<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Mental<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>) 60 feet, DC 24 Will save.   A creature that fails becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Frightened<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> 3 and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Fleeing<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for 1 round. On success the creature becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Frightened<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> 1. Regardless of success or failure, it is immune to this aura for 24 hours after exposure to it.

abilities_bot.name: Create Spawn ⬻
abilities_bot.desc: When the spawn hits with a slam or worm toss, a worm burrows into the target.   The worm deals `dice: 1d4` 1d4 persistent mental damage each round as it seeks the brain. While infected you are <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Off-Guard<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Clumsy 1<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>.   After `dice: 1d4+1` 1d4+1 rounds, the creature must succeed at a DC 24 Fortitude save or become <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Confused<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for 1 minute.   A second failure while confused results in instant death, and the creature rises as a new Spawn of Kyuss in `dice: 1d4` 1d4 rounds unless the body is destroyed.   **Countermeasures:** A successful DC 20 <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Skills#Medicine|Medicine<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> check can extract the worm. <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Cleanse Affliction<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> destroys all worms in the host.   **Worm Defense:** A creature that hits the spawn with unarmed or natural attacks is exposed to 1d4 worms as above.

abilities_bot.name: Worm Explosion
abilities_bot.desc: **Trigger**: The spawn is reduced to 0 HP  **Effect**: `dice: 1d4+1` 1d4+1 Kyuss worms erupt in a 10-foot burst. Each adjacent creature must succeed at a DC 22 Reflex save or have a worm latch on. Creatures with natural armor +3 or less are automatically affected.

abilities_bot.name: Kyuss’ Gift
abilities_bot.desc: (<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Disease<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>, <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Divine<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>)   **Saving Throw** DC 23 Fortitude; **Onset** 1 day; **Stage 1** carrier with no symptoms (1 day),   **Stage 2** 2d6 necrotic damage and the target becomes <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Drained 2<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Confused<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> for 1 day,   **Stage 3** 3d6 necrotic damage. The target is <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Drained 3<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> and <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Confused<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> until cured or dies.   **Special:** Healing magic only restores half HP while afflicted. <STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK>Cleanse Affliction<STATBLOCK-WIKI-LINK> cures the condition fully.

nested.callback: return `Kill one _${monster.name}_ for every ${monster.hp} damage dealt to the mob`

diceParsing.parser: let [,i,s,n]=matches;let m=s==='-'?-1:1;let t; if(!isNaN(Number(n))){t=`1d20+${m*Number(n)}`} return [original, " (", { text: t }, ")"];
